verses.verse: Unto <S%H430>you<s%>, O God, do we give <S%H3034>thanks<s%>, unto you do we give <S%H3034>thanks<s%>: for that your <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> your wondrous <S%H6381>works<s%> <S%H5608>declare<s%>.
When I shall <S%H3947>receive<s%> the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H4339>uprightly<s%>.
The <S%H776>earth<s%> and all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> there are <S%H4127>dissolved<s%>: I carry <S%H8505>up<s%> the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H5542>it<s%>. Selah.
I <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H1984>fools<s%>, Deal not <S%H1984>foolishly<s%>: and to the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, Lift not <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H7161>horn<s%>:
Lift not <S%H7311>up<s%> your <S%H7161>horn<s%> on <S%H4791>high<s%>: <S%H1696>speak<s%> not with a <S%H6277>stiff<s%> <S%H6677>neck<s%>.
For <S%H7311>promotion<s%> comes neither from the <S%H4161>east<s%>, nor from the <S%H4628>west<s%>, nor from the <S%H4057>south<s%>.
But <S%H430>God<s%> is the <S%H8199>judge<s%>: he puts <S%H8213>down<s%> <S%H7311>one<s%>, and sets up another.

For in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> there is a <S%H3563>cup<s%>, and the <S%H3196>wine<s%> is <S%H2560>red<s%>; it is <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H4538>mixture<s%>; and he pours <S%H5064>out<s%> of the <S%H2088>same<s%>: but the <S%H8105>dregs<s%> <S%H7563>there<s%>, all the wicked of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall wring them <S%H4680>out<s%>, and drink <S%H8354>them<s%>.
But I will <S%H5046>declare<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>; I will sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> to the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.
All the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> also will I cut <S%H1438>off<s%>; but the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall be <S%H7311>exalted<s%>.
